description:
In this game, your main goal is to help Johnny Rocket fight “Evil Forces.” To do that, you can run, jump, double jump, shoot enemies. Don’t forget about Johnny's secret movement - destroy obstacles or enemies with his head All levels are unique and have a big variety of enemies. Boss fights are tough, bet you break your controller trying to defeat any of them! After each boss fight you get rewarded with a comic cartoon movie telling you more about Johnny's adventure. Game is hilarious and has a lot of toilet humour, don't forget to collect the paper!

Johnny Rocket gameplay is made of action platforming, stylised as a free-hand black and white cartoon. Cartoon world feels alive and you can destroy buildings. You get to see a funny cartoon cut scene in between levels!
name: Johnny Rocket
